name: Brain vs Puzzle
description:
Brain vs Puzzle is a collection of the best and most extraordinary logic puzzles. With a merging of all gorgeous puzzles like Sudoku,minesweeper,blocks,Brain vs Puzzle provides you a ONE-STOP game experience.As a puzzle lover,you will find no limits but almost infinite fun and we will keep updating more thrilling games.Any puzzle games(Rolling Ball, Escape…) as long as you want it show in our collection,just make us know.

Sudoku
• Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle.
• The objective is to fill a 9x9 grid with digits so that each column, each row,
and each of the nine 3x3 sub-grids that compose the grid contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.

MineSweeper-colorfill
The game interface at first shows some small boxes with numbers. It is played in a way similar to minesweeper, but you must try to fill up the same color first. The game is over once you fill in the color wrong.

Blocks
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then break the bricks and clear.
• Blocks can't be rotated.

FEATURES
•More games and levels are being designed. You can enjoy the freshness it brings to you.
•The difficulty of professional game levels meets the needs of different users.
•Play offline
•Continuous update
